PageTitle: peer advertise-large-community (BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view) (group)
FuncDef:
The peer advertise-large-community command enables a device to advertise the Large-Community attribute to a peer group.
The undo peer advertise-large-community command cancels the configuration. The peer advertise-large-community command enables a device to advertise the Large-Community attribute to a peer group. The undo peer advertise-large-community command cancels the configuration. By default, a device does not advertise the Large-Community attribute to any peer group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: To enable a device to advertise the Large-Community attribute to its BGP peer or peer group, run the peer advertise-large-community command. If the Large-Community attribute is advertised to a peer group, all the peer members in the group inherit this configuration. This simplifies the application of route-policies and facilitates route maintenance and management.
